name: obsidian-opencode
description: Embed OpenCode AI assistant in Obsidian

scripts.build: bun run tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && bun run esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: bun run scripts/sync-manifest-version.ts && git add manifest.json
scripts.version:patch: bun pm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:minor: bun pm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:major: bun pm version major && git push --follow-tags

author: mat
